TITLE: Votaniki Yellow Stuttgarter Onion Bulbs - Large and Sweet Onions, Highly Productive Onion Bulbs for Planting - Easy to Grow and Low Maintenance (300 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Votaniki Yellow Stuttgarter Onion Bulbs - Stuttgarter Onion is the perfect addition to the vegetable garden! These onion bulbs produce large, round, yellow-skinned onions with a mild and sweet flavor that is perfect for cooking or eating raw. Stuttgarter Onion is easy to grow and can be planted in any well-draining soil with full sun exposure. These bulbs are highly productive and can be harvested in late summer to early fall. Stuttgarter Onion is versatile and can be used in a wide variety of dishes, including salads, soups, stews, and more. Plus, they are great for long-term storage, so you can enjoy the fresh taste of these onions for months to come. When planting these onion bulbs, it's important to give them enough space to grow. They should be planted about 4 inches apart, and the soil should be kept consistently moist but not waterlogged. These onions prefer a pH level between 6.0 and 7.5, so it's important to check your soil's pH level before planting. Once harvested, the Stuttgarter Onion can be stored in a cool, dry place for up to six months. They can also be pickled or canned for long-term storage. With their sweet and mild flavor, these onions are perfect for adding flavor to a variety of dishes, including burgers, sandwiches, and stir-fries. In summary, the Yellow Stuttgarter Onion is a top-quality onion variety that every gardener should consider adding to their collection. They are easy to grow, highly productive, and versatile, making them a great addition to any home-cooked meal.

TITLE: Votaniki Nori Gladiolus Bulbs - Versatility, Large Blooms, Perennial & Hardy Nori Gladiolus Bulbs for Planting - Fast Growing and Year Round Beauty (12 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Nori Gladiolus is a stunning variety of gladiolus that are sure to add a touch of elegance to any garden or floral arrangement. These Gladiolus produce brilliant, violet-blue blooms with creamy white throats and delicate sepals shooting from each center. One of the standout features of the Nori Gladiolus is their hardiness and adaptability. This Gladiolus thrive in full sun to partial shade and are tolerant of a wide range of soil types, making them an excellent choice for gardeners of all levels. They're also relatively low maintenance, requiring only occasional watering and fertilization to produce a bountiful display of blooms. The Nori Gladiolus is an excellent choice for both novice and experienced gardeners looking to add a pop of color to their outdoor space. These Gladiolus bulbs are perfect for planting in borders or as a focal point in a mixed perennial bed. In addition to their stunning appearance and hardiness, Nori Gladiolus is also known for their versatility. They can be planted in groups to create a bold, colorful display, or scattered throughout a garden to add pops of color and interest. They also make excellent companions to other perennials and annuals, allowing gardeners to create a unique and varied landscape. When planting Nori Gladiolus Bulbs, it's important to choose a location with well-drained soil and ample sunlight. Bulbs should be planted in the spring after the danger of frost has passed. They should be spaced about 6-8 inches apart and planted at a depth of 4-6 inches. Once planted, Nori Gladiolus requires only minimal care. They should be watered regularly, especially during dry spells, and fertilized with a balanced fertilizer every few weeks. Deadheading spent blooms will encourage the plant to produce more flowers

TITLE: Votaniki Lavender Perfection Dahlia Dinner Plate
DESCRIPTION: Votaniki Lavender Perfection Dahlia Perennial Flower Bulbs Outdoor Plants with Magical Purple-pink FlowersPlant dahlia tubers in the spring, and then let nature take its course until sprouting occurs. Do not water dahlia tubers until green growth shows above the surface. They will not need water before their root system develops. These perennial plants will bloom from mid-summer through to autumn or the arrival of the first frost. How to Get Dahlias to BloomPerrenial plants and flowers bloom best when the plant is not flopping to the ground, so make sure to use stakes and twine to keep potted plant up and erect. Fertilize your dahlias every 20 days to allow flowers to proliferate.  Soil Type:Lavender live plant prefer rich, loamy soil that contains plenty of soggy matter and drains well. If your backyard soil is denser clay, add in sand, peat moss, or manure to loosen the soil texture for better drainage. Dinnerplate dahlia bulbs thrives in a neutral soil pH of around 6.5. Specification:Common Name: Lavender perfection dahliaBotanical Name: Dahlia 'Checkers'Family: AsteraceaePlant Type: PerennialMature Size: 1-6 ft. tall, and 1-3 ft. wideSun Exposure: Full SunSoil Type: Loamy, well-drainedBloom Period: Summer, fallFlower Color:  Red, whiteFoliage Color: GreenPlanting Depth: 20 cmPlanting Spacing:  60 cmHardiness Zones: 8-11 (USDA)Native Area: North America, Central America

DESCRIPTION: Montego Bay Lily is a stunning addition to any garden or landscape. This Lily bulbs produce large, sweet-smelling, funnel-shaped lilies that bloom on tall spikes in early summer. Beautiful flowers have yellow centers that transition to red and orange out to the tip of each petal. They grow up to 36 inches tall, making them a great option for creating a dramatic focal point in your garden or for adding height to a border planting. The Montego Bay Lily is easy to grow and maintain. They prefer full sun to partial shade and well-drained soil. Once established, they require minimal watering. These bulbs are also great for naturalizing, meaning that they will continue to grow and multiply over time, providing you with even more beautiful blooms. Montego Bay Lily flowers are also perfect for cut flower arrangements, as their long, sturdy stems make them easy to work with. The flowers have a sweet, subtle fragrance that adds to their charm. The Montego Bay Lily Bulbs are hardy and adaptable, making them suitable for a range of growing conditions. They can be planted in borders, mixed plantings, or as standalone specimens, and they pair well with a variety of other plants, including ornamental grasses, coneflowers, and hydrangeas. When planting Montego Bay Lily Bulbs, it is important to choose a location with well-drained soil and to plant them at the proper depth, which is about three times the height of the bulb. They should be watered regularly during the growing season, but not over-watered, as this can cause the bulbs to rot. Overall, Montego Bay Lily Bulbs are an excellent choice for any gardener looking to add a touch of elegance and beauty to their outdoor space. With their stunning blooms and easy maintenance, these bulbs are sure to impress and delight for years to come.

Plant the bulbs in well-draining soil and in a location that receives full sun to partial shade. They thrive in USDA hardiness zones 7-10 and will bloom in mid to late summer. Purple Flora Gladiolus is a versatile choice for any garden or landscaping project. Their striking coloration makes them an ideal focal point, while their tall stems and prolific blooms. In addition to their beauty and ease of care, the Purple Flora Gladiolus is also known for its long-lasting blooms. Each stem will produce multiple flowers, and with proper care, the blooms can last for several weeks, making them a great choice for cut flower arrangements. Gladiolus are also highly adaptable and can be grown in a variety of settings. Whether you plant them in your garden beds, containers, or use them as cut flowers, they are sure to add a touch of elegance and sophistication to any space.

TITLE: Nike Mens Manoa Leather Hiking Boot (Haystack/Haystack-Velvet Brown, Numeric_9_Point_5)
Votaniki 12 Purple Ranunculus Bulbs Persian Buttercup Large Corms Rich Purple Blooms
DESCRIPTION: Votaniki Ranunculus flowers look almost too perfect to be real. Their rose-like blossoms feature layer upon layer of tissue-thin petals. Though not often seen in home gardens, the exquisite flowers of ranunculus are a staple in high-end flower shops and wedding bouquets. If you're a fan of ranunculus, why not try growing them yourself? The corms can be planted in containers or in a garden so you can enjoy their beautiful blooms both indoors and out. Growing ranunculus outdoors is easy! In zones 8 and warmer, plant ranunculus bulbs in the fall. In colder zones, plant in spring. It takes between 2-3 months for spring planted ranunculus to bloom after planting. Choose a spot for your ranunculus where the soil drains well. If you see that water still puddles 5 to 6 hours after a hard rain, find another spot. You can amend the soil, instead, by adding organic matter, at least 2 to 3 inches of it, to improve drainage. You can find peat moss, compost, ground bark, or decomposed manure pretty much anywhere; all work great. Its always easiest to start with a good spot that you know theyll like, though. Plant bulbs 4-6 inches apart, 2-3 inches deep. Water after planting to encourage bulbs to establish roots. Refrain from watering again until you see leaves sprouting.

TITLE: Votaniki Cora Louise - Itoh Peony (Paeonia Cora Louise) Bareroots for Planting (1 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Votaniki Cora Louise - Itoh Peony large, semi-double blossoms, white with striking dark lavender central flares, stand above lush, toothed foliage. Flowers have a soft, pleasing scent and are a wonderful addition to any spring bouquet. An especially vigorous plant  it can produce up to 50 blooms in a single season; the sturdy flower stems require no staking Deep green foliage is divided into lance-shaped segments. Foliage remains attractive throughout the growing season. Plants die back to the ground after fall frost. Cora Louise easily grow in rich, fertile, medium moisture, well-drained soils in full sun to part shade. Cora Lewis flowers are particularly vigorous plants, multiplying very quickly. Cora Louise flowers are superb for flower arrangements. This hardy perennial is an intersectional hybrid  a cross which marries the exotic looks of tree peonies with the herbaceous growth habit of herbaceous peonies, and often called an Itoh Peony. A lovely addition to cottage garden planting schemes. Height: 75cm (29"). Spread: 90cm (36").

Cora Louise easily grow in rich, fertile, medium moisture, well-drained soils in full sun to part shade. Cora Lewis flowers are particularly vigorous plants, multiplying very quickly. Cora Louise flowers are superb for flower arrangements. This hardy perennial is an intersectional hybrid  a cross which marries the exotic looks of tree peonies with the herbaceous growth habit of herbaceous peonies, and often called an Itoh Peony. A lovely addition to cottage garden planting schemes. Height: 75cm (29"). Spread: 90cm (36").

With proper care, your Legacy Blueberry Plant can continue to produce fruit for many years, providing you with a bountiful harvest year after year. TITLE: Votaniki Vancouver Dahlia Bulbs - Perennial, Dahlia Dinnerplate Vancouver, Large Booms | Dahlia Bulbs for Planting - Hardy and Easy to Care (4 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Votaniki Vancouver Dahlia bulbs produce stunning, vibrant blooms that will add a splash of color and beauty to any outdoor space. Each Vancouver Dahlia Bulb is carefully selected and grown with the utmost care to ensure that it meets our strict quality standards. These Dahlia are highly adaptable to various soil types, so whether you have clay, sandy, or loamy soil, these bulbs will thrive and produce stunning flowers. Vancouver Dahlia is a type of decorative dahlia with fully double flowers that can grow up to 6 inches in diameter. The blooms are a beautiful shade of white with a hint of soft pink on the petals' edges, and the flowers have a long vase life, making them perfect for cut flower arrangements. Planting Vancouver Dahlia Bulbs is easy and straightforward. Simply dig a hole that is slightly larger than the bulb's size, place the bulb in the hole, and cover it with soil. Water the bulbs regularly and make sure they receive plenty of sunlight, and you'll be rewarded with a stunning display of blooms. Vancouver Dahlia is also hardy and easy to care for, making them an excellent choice for both novice and experienced gardeners alike. With the proper care, Vancouver Dahlia can produce an abundance of blooms for years to come, making them a great long-term investment. Vancouver Dahlia, it's worth noting that they typically bloom from mid-summer through to the first frost, providing a long season of color in your garden. They grow to a height of around 3 to 4 feet and have a spread of around 2 to 3 feet, so they can make an impact in your garden bed or even in a large container.

TITLE: Votaniki David Howard Dahlia Bulbs - Perennial Dahlia, Long Lasting Blooms - Attracts Pollinators, Easy to Grow & Maintain | Orange Dahlia Flowering Bulbs for Planting (1 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Votaniki David Howard Dahlia is a stunning flowering perennial that will add a pop of color and beauty to any garden. With its vibrant orange-red blooms and dark purple foliage, it is a true showstopper. This variety of Dahlia is a compact grower, reaching a height of 18-24 inches with a similar spread, making it a perfect choice for small gardens or container planting. The flowers of the David Howard Dahlia measure approximately 3-4 inches in diameter and are produced in abundance from mid-summer until the first frost. Not only is this plant visually stunning, but it is also easy to care for. The David Howard Dahlia prefers full sun to partial shade and well-draining soil. Regular watering and fertilization will promote healthy growth and a prolonged flowering period. David Howard Dahlia plant is hardy in USDA Zones 8-10, but can also be grown as an annual in cooler climates. It is a relatively low-maintenance plant that requires regular deadheading to encourage continuous blooming. In addition, staking may be necessary to keep the plant from drooping under the weight of its heavy blooms. One of the most unique features of the David Howard Dahlia is its dark purple foliage. The leaves are deeply cut and provide a beautiful contrast to the bright orange-red flowers. This stunning color combination makes the plant an eye-catching addition to any garden, whether planted alone or in combination with other plants.

TITLE: Votaniki Commander in Cheif Lily Bulbs - Fragrant, Perennial, Large Flowering Lily Bulbs | Striking Appearance and Easy Care - Perfect Addition to Any Garden (2 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Votaniki Commander in Chief Lily is a beautiful and hardy variety of lilies that are perfect for adding color and vibrancy to any garden. These lilies are a stunning deep red color, with large, trumpet-shaped blooms that are sure to catch the eye of anyone passing by. One of the standout features of Commander in Chief Lily is their ability to thrive in a wide range of conditions. They are tolerant of both full sun and partial shade, and can even grow well in containers if space is limited. They are also very easy to care for, requiring only moderate watering and occasional fertilization to stay healthy and beautiful. In terms of size, Commander in Chief Lily can grow to be quite tall, reaching heights of up to four feet in some cases. This makes them ideal for use as a background or border plant, where they can provide a stunning backdrop for other flowers or foliage. In addition to their striking appearance and hardy nature, Commander-in-Chief Lily is also known for their pleasant fragrance. Their sweet scent makes them a popular choice for cut flower arrangements and bouquets, as well as for use in perfumes and other scented products. When planting Commander in Chief Lily Bulbs, it is important to choose a location with well-draining soil and good air circulation. They should be planted in the fall, before the ground freezes, and will typically bloom in the early to mid-summer months. To keep them looking their best, deadhead spent blooms regularly and provides support for taller plants if necessary. Whether you are an experienced gardener or just starting out, Commander-in-Chief Lily Bulbs are a great choice for adding beauty and color to your outdoor space. With their hardy nature, easy care requirements, and stunning blooms, they are sure to become a beloved addition to your garden for years to come.

These Dahlia bulbs are easy to plant and care for, making them an ideal choice for gardeners of all skill levels. Sylvia Dahlia is a hardy and reliable variety that will produce blooms year after year. When planting Sylvia Dahlia bulbs, it is important to wait until the soil has warmed up in the spring before planting. Sylvia Dahlia makes a great addition to any cut flower arrangement, and their long vase life makes them a popular choice for florists. TITLE: Votaniki O'Neal Blueberry Bush 1 Gallon Plant 2 Year Old - Perennial, High Yielding, Blueberry Live Plant - Perfect Addition to Fruit Garden - Easy to Grow (4 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: The Votaniki O'Neal Blueberry Bush is fruit-bearing shrub that is perfect for gardeners looking to add a delicious and nutritious addition to their backyard. One of the most important features of the O'Neal Blueberry Bush is its ability to produce a large number of blueberries each year. These berries are sweet and juicy, with a bright blue color that makes them perfect for eating fresh or using in a variety of recipes. Because this plant is self-pollinating, it does not require another blueberry bush to produce fruit. In addition to its delicious fruit, the O'Neal Blueberry Bush is also known for its attractive foliage. The leaves are a deep green color, with a glossy sheen that adds a touch of elegance to any garden. As the plant matures, it will develop a rounded shape that is both attractive and functional, providing plenty of shade for other plants in the area. O'Neal Blueberry plant can grow in a variety of soil types but prefers well-draining soil. This plant is tolerant to drought and heat. It is also known for its cold hardiness, making it a great choice for gardeners in colder climates who want to grow blueberries. As the plant grows, it may require some pruning to maintain its shape and size. Pruning can also help to promote more fruit production and ensure that the plant stays healthy. The O'Neal Blueberry Bush can grow up to 6 feet tall and 4 feet wide, so it is important to give it enough space to grow and spread. When caring for the O'Neal Blueberry Bush, it is important to provide it with regular watering and fertilization. It is recommended to fertilize this plant with an acid fertilizer, as blueberries prefer acidic soil. Additionally, it is important to protect the plant from birds, which may try to eat the fruit. This can be done by using netting or other protective measures.

TITLE: Votaniki Black Hollyhocks Flowering Rhizome - Perennial, Long-Lasting, Attracts Pollinators, Unique Color Flower | Eye-Catching Black Hollyhocks Flower (1 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Votaniki Black Hollyhocks are a striking and unique addition to any garden. These Hollyhocks produce tall, spiky blooms in a deep black color that stands out against the green foliage. They are easy to grow and care for, making them a popular choice for both experienced and novice gardeners. Black Hollyhocks flowers are a favorite of pollinators, attracting bees, butterflies, and hummingbirds to your garden. These Hollyhocks Rhizome can be planted in the spring for summer blooms and will come back year after year, providing a long-lasting and stunning display. Black Hollyhocks are also a popular choice for cottage gardens, where their tall stature and bold blooms can be used as a backdrop for shorter flowers and shrubs. Black Hollyhocks are also suitable for cut flower arrangements, bringing a touch of the outdoors into your home. Add the elegant and eye-catching Black Hollyhocks to your garden! Black Hollyhocks are also low-maintenance and drought-tolerant, making them a great choice for busy gardeners or those in drier climates. They prefer full sun but can also grow in partially shaded areas. Black Hollyhocks grow best in rich, well-draining soil and should be watered regularly during the growing season. Deadheading the spent blooms will encourage more flowers to grow, but they can also be left to self-seed.

TITLE: Nike Women's Air Max Thea MID Black/Silver 859550-001 (Size: 6)
Blue Wish Dinnerplate Dahlia Tubers | Cut Flower, Easy to Grow & Maintain - Blue Wish Dahlia Bulbs, Large Blooms (2 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: The Blue Wish dahlia with its incredible ornamental flowers will light up the end of the garden season. The subtle combination of white with the purple-blue petal tips add freshness to every setting. These vigorous plants produce lavish green foliage. Flowers develop atop the up to 120 centimetres tall stems. You can admire them in the second half of summer and at the beginning of autumn. Vigorous dahlias are plants worth growing in every home garden. They will pass the test as border plants and those grown in groups on lawns. Due to its height, dahlia can be used as garden dividers and cover for less attractive plot parts. Permeable and fertile soils suit dahlia the most. Make sure to regularly water soils. You should remove wilted flowers to stimulate dahlias to more abundant and long lasting blooming. Dahlia will adorn your garden for years to come if you dig out its frost sensitive rootstock after the end of each season. Roughly cleaned and dried dahlia tubers should be stored in a dry, ventilated room that is well protected from frost. Storing dahlia rootstock in baskets or airy boxes, layered with peat or sawdust, proves to be most convenient. Plant the rootstock again after the last frost in spring.

DESCRIPTION: Acidanthera Murielae, also known as the Abyssinian Gladiolus or the Peacock Orchid, is a beautiful flowering plant that produces delicate, fragrant flowers that bloom in late summer. The Acidanthera Murielae bulbs are an excellent choice for gardeners who want to add a touch of elegance and sophistication to their gardens. These bulbs are easy to plant and care for, making them a great choice for novice gardeners. The bulbs can be planted in the spring, and they will produce tall, slender stems that can reach up to three feet in height. Acidanthera Murielae prefers full sun to partial shade and well-drained soil. They can be planted in garden beds, containers, or even in borders. These flowers are also excellent for cut flowers and can be used to create beautiful floral arrangements. This flowering plant is highly adaptable to different growing conditions. They are tolerant of both drought and humidity, making them an excellent choice for a wide range of climates. When it comes to planting Acidanthera Murielae bulbs, it is important to plant them at the correct depth. They should be planted about 4-6 inches deep and spaced about 4-6 inches apart. The bulbs should be planted with the pointed end facing up and covered with soil. One of the best things about these Acidanthera Murielae is that they are very low-maintenance. Once planted, they require very little care beyond occasional watering and fertilizing.

The Acidanthera Murielae bulbs are an excellent choice for gardeners who want to add a touch of elegance and sophistication to their gardens. These bulbs are easy to plant and care for, making them a great choice for novice gardeners. The bulbs can be planted in the spring, and they will produce tall, slender stems that can reach up to three feet in height. At the top of each stem, delicate white flowers with a maroon center and a sweet fragrance will bloom, creating a stunning display. Acidanthera Murielae prefers full sun to partial shade and well-drained soil. They can be planted in garden beds, containers, or even in borders. These flowers are also excellent for cut flowers and can be used to create beautiful floral arrangements. This flowering plant is highly adaptable to different growing conditions. They are tolerant of both drought and humidity, making them an excellent choice for a wide range of climates. When it comes to planting Acidanthera Murielae bulbs, it is important to plant them at the correct depth. They should be planted about 4-6 inches deep and spaced about 4-6 inches apart. The bulbs should be planted with the pointed end facing up and covered with soil. One of the best things about these Acidanthera Murielae is that they are very low-maintenance. Once planted, they require very little care beyond occasional watering and fertilizing.

TITLE: Votaniki Orange Perfection Phlox Roots - Stunning Blooms and Sweet Fragrance, Attracts Pollinators | Phlox Roots for Planting - Hardy and Versatile Perennial Plant! (3 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Orange Perfection Phlox plants are characterized by their striking orange blooms that are sure to catch the eye of anyone passing by. The plants are easy to grow and care for, making them perfect for both experienced and novice gardeners. Each Orange Perfection Phlox root produces a thick stem that can grow up to 3 feet tall, which makes them perfect for creating a striking backdrop in any garden. The plants produce numerous clusters of bright orange flowers, each with a distinctive five-petaled shape. The flowers bloom in mid to late summer, providing a splash of color to your garden when other plants may have stopped blooming. These plants are hardy and can thrive in a variety of conditions. They prefer well-drained soil and plenty of sunshine, but they can also tolerate some shade. In addition to their beauty and ease of care, Orange Perfection Phlox flowers also have a lovely fragrance that will fill your garden with a sweet, spicy scent. This makes them a popular choice for adding sensory interest to any outdoor space. Orange Perfection Phlox roots are perennials, meaning they will come back year after year with proper care. They are also a great choice for attracting pollinators, such as bees and butterflies, to your garden, as the brightly colored blooms are a favorite of these important insects. When planting Orange Perfection Phlox roots, it's best to space them about 1-2 feet apart to allow for their mature size. They also benefit from regular watering, particularly during dry spells or hot weather. Deadheading the spent blooms can encourage more flowers to bloom, and pruning back the stems in the fall can help promote healthy growth the following season.

This tree produces fragrant, lavender-pink flowers in the late spring and early summer, which not only look stunning but also give off a delightful fragrance that can fill the air. The 1-gallon plant is a 2-year-old sapling that has been carefully cultivated to ensure that it is strong and healthy. It is ideal for planting in a variety of locations, including garden borders, along driveways or walkways, or as a standalone tree. The Villosa Lilac Tree can reach a height of up to 8-10 feet, making it a great choice for smaller gardens or spaces. The plant is easy to care for and requires little maintenance. It prefers full sun to partial shade and well-drained soil. The Villosa Lilac Tree is a deciduous tree that sheds its leaves in the fall. During the growing season, it produces attractive green foliage that turns yellow in the fall before dropping. The tree is relatively slow-growing, taking several years to reach its full height, but it is well worth the wait. The plant is also relatively low-maintenance, requiring only occasional pruning to maintain its shape and remove dead or damaged branches. This makes it an excellent choice for busy gardeners or those who don't have a lot of time to devote to plant care. Villosa Lilac Tree is also a favorite among gardeners and landscapers for its ability to attract pollinators like butterflies and bees. The fragrant flowers are particularly attractive to these insects, making this tree a great choice for those looking to support local wildlife.

TITLE: Votaniki David Phlox Bare Root Start - Perennial, Fragrant Blooms, Paniculata David Phlox Bare Root for Planting - Perfect for Borders, Garden Beds, and Containers (4 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Votaniki David Phlox Bare Root Start - David Phlox is a stunning perennial plant that is highly valued for its gorgeous white flowers and long-lasting blooms. This variety of phlox is a favorite among gardeners for its reliability, hardiness, and ability to thrive in a variety of garden settings. David Phlox is a compact plant that can reach a height of 2-3 feet and a width of 1-2 feet. It is known for its upright, bushy growth habit and produces clusters of fragrant, white flowers that are up to 6 inches across. The plant's foliage is a deep green and remains attractive throughout the growing season. One of the best features of David Phlox is its extended blooming period. The plant typically blooms from early to mid-summer and can continue to produce new flowers through the fall. If deadheaded regularly, it will often reward the gardener with an extended blooming season. David Phlox is an easy-to-grow plant that is highly adaptable to different growing conditions. It prefers well-draining soil and should be planted in an area with full sun to partial shade. It is also drought-tolerant and can thrive in a variety of soil types. This plant is an excellent choice for a variety of garden settings, including garden beds, borders, and containers. It is often combined with other perennials, shrubs, or annuals to create a stunning mixed display. David Phlox is a pollinator magnet, attracting bees, butterflies, and hummingbirds to the garden. This makes it an excellent choice for gardeners who want to support the local ecosystem and help sustain important pollinators.

DESCRIPTION: Votaniki Chinese Wisteria (Wisteria sinensis) is a stunning deciduous vine that is beloved for its cascading clusters of fragrant, lavender-blue flowers that bloom in late spring to early summer. It's a great addition to any garden or landscape, adding a touch of elegance and beauty. Our Chinese Wisteria Quart Pot Root start is a great option for those who want to grow this beautiful vine in their own yard. The plant comes in a quart-sized pot with a well-established root system, which makes it easy to plant and care for. This Quart Pot Root start is a healthy and robust plant that has been carefully grown and nurtured to ensure its quality. It's perfect for adding vertical interest to your garden, as it can climb up a trellis, arbor, or pergola. This Chinese Wisteria variety is known for its fast-growing habit, so you'll be able to enjoy its stunning blooms sooner rather than later. It's also a low-maintenance plant, requiring little care and attention once it's established. Chinese Wisteria is a hardy plant that can withstand a range of weather conditions, making it a great option for many different climates. It prefers full sun to partial shade and well-drained soil, but it can adapt to different growing conditions. Chinese Wisteria is a versatile plant that can be used in a variety of ways. It's great for covering walls, fences, and trellises, or you can let it climb up a tree or other tall structure for a unique look.

TITLE: Votaniki Pink Attraction Phlox Bare Root - Perennial, Versatile, and Suitable for Various Planting - Beautiful Pink Blooms for Any Garden - Long Blooming Season (1 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Pink Attraction Phlox is a stunning perennial plant that adds vibrant pink blooms to your garden every summer. This bare-root variety is easy to plant and care for, making it an ideal choice for both novice and experienced gardeners. Pink Attraction Phlox features large, fragrant, pink flowers with white centers that bloom from mid to late summer. These flowers grow in dense clusters atop tall, sturdy stems that can reach up to 2-3 feet in height. The lush green foliage forms a bushy mound at the base of the plant, creating an attractive backdrop for the eye-catching blooms. This plant is low-maintenance, making it a great choice for any garden. It thrives in full sun to partial shade and prefers well-drained soil with regular watering. Once established, the Pink Attraction Phlox will require minimal maintenance and will reward you with years of beautiful blooms. This bare root plant comes in a dormant state, meaning it is shipped without soil and without leaves, but it will quickly grow and establish itself once planted. Bare root plants are also easy to transport and plant, making them a cost-effective option for gardeners. When planting the Pink Attraction Phlox bare root, be sure to choose a location with well-draining soil and enough space to accommodate its height and spread. Plant the bare root in a hole deep enough to cover the roots, and water thoroughly after planting. As the plant grows, it may require staking to support its tall stems. If you're looking to add a pop of color to your garden, the Pink Attraction Phlox bare root is an excellent choice. Whether planted in borders, cottage gardens, or mixed flower beds, this plant will add a touch of beauty to your outdoor space.

TITLE: Votaniki Isabella Gladiolus Bulbs - Perennial Gladiolus Flowering Bulbs for Planting | Versatile, Long Lasting, and Perfect for Cut Flowers - Low Maintenance & Easy to Grow (20 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Votaniki Isabella Gladiolus is a gorgeous variety of gladiolus that feature striking pink and white petals with dark pink accents. These bulbs are a must-have for any garden or landscape looking to add a touch of elegance and sophistication. With a height of up to 4 feet, Isabella Gladiolus produce tall, slender spikes with multiple blooms per stem, making them perfect for cut flower arrangements or as a stunning focal point in any garden. They bloom in mid to late summer, bringing a burst of color to any outdoor space. Isabella Gladiolus is easy to grow and care for, requiring full sun and well-drained soil. Plant them in groups of 10-12 bulbs for a dramatic effect, spacing them about 6 inches apart. Isabella Gladiolus is hardy and can be left in the ground over winter, providing you with years of enjoyment. Isabella Gladiolus is known for its large, showy flowers that add a touch of glamour to any garden or landscape. The blooms are perfect for cutting and creating eye-catching floral arrangements, with each spike producing multiple flowers that last for weeks. These Gladiolus are ideal for adding height and structure to your garden, with their tall spikes and bold, striking colors. They are also versatile and can be used in a variety of garden settings, including mixed borders, cutting gardens, and containers. Isabella Gladiolus is also a favorite of pollinators, attracting butterflies, bees, and other beneficial insects to your garden. This not only adds to the beauty of your outdoor space but also helps support local ecosystems and biodiversity.

TITLE: Votaniki Arapaho BlackBerry 1 Gallon Plant 2 Year Old - Perennial, Fast Growing and High Yielding Arapaho BlackBerry Plant - Low-Maintenance (2 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: The Votaniki Arapaho Blackberry Plant is a fruit plant that will enhance your garden or orchard with its delicious fruit and stunning appearance. This plant is a two-year-old specimen, meaning it's already well established and ready to start producing fruit in its first year. The Arapaho blackberry plant produces large, juicy berries that are sweet and flavorful, making them perfect for snacking, baking, or making jams and jellies. The berries are in deep red and black color that adds a beautiful touch to your garden or fruit basket. This particular variety of blackberry plants, the Arapaho, is known for its high yields, making it an excellent choice for home gardeners and commercial farmers alike. It's a thornless plant, which makes it easy to harvest the fruit without getting pricked by thorns. The Arapaho blackberry plant is a self-fertile variety, meaning it doesn't require another blackberry plant for pollination. It prefers full sun exposure and well-drained soil, but can also tolerate partial shade and various soil types. The plant typically reaches a height of 3-5 feet and a width of 3-4 feet, making it a great option for small gardens or containers. When planting the Arapaho blackberry plant, it's important to ensure it has enough space to spread and receive adequate sunlight. The plant should be watered regularly during the growing season, and fertilizer can be applied in the spring to promote healthy growth and fruit production. In addition to being a great source of fresh fruit, the Arapaho blackberry plant can also be used in landscaping as a beautiful ornamental plant. Its dark green foliage and vibrant fruits make it an attractive addition to any garden or landscape.

Their long, sturdy stems make them ideal for cutting and using in bouquets and floral arrangements. Forever Susan lilies are easy to grow and care for, making them an excellent choice for both novice and experienced gardeners. They prefer well-draining soil and full sun to partial shade. Once planted, they require minimal maintenance and will continue to thrive year after year. In addition to their stunning beauty and ease of care, Forever Susan lilies are also highly fragrant, with a sweet and spicy scent that will fill your garden or home with a delightful aroma. One of the benefits of Forever Susan lily is its adaptability to different growing conditions. They are tolerant of a range of soil types and can be grown in containers or directly in the ground. When planting Forever Susan lily bulbs, it's important to choose a location with good drainage and to plant them at a depth of about 6 inches. Water the bulbs regularly during the growing season, but be careful not to overwater, as this can lead to root rot. Whether you're looking to add some color and fragrance to your garden or create stunning floral arrangements, Forever Susan lily bulbs are an excellent choice. With their stunning blooms, easy care, and delightful fragrance, these bulbs are sure to be a beloved addition to any landscape or floral design.

TITLE: Votaniki Purple Dinner Plate Dahlia Vancouver Bulbs - Easy to Grown | Large Blooms | Great for Cutting Gardens - Dahlia Flower Bulbs for Planting (2 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Dinner Plate Dahlia is known for its large, 10-inch blooms. The flowers have a flattened shape, like a dinner plate Purple color. The plant itself can grow to be quite tall, up to 5 feet, and is ideal for the back of a border or as a focal point in a garden bed. It blooms in late summer to fall and its tubers can be saved over winter in cold climates and re-planted the following spring. They are also very popular in cut-flower arrangements. Dinner Plate Dahlias like "Vancouver" are cultivars of the species Dahlia hybrida. They are popular for their large, showy blooms and long blooming period, often from late summer to the first frost. These dahlias require full sun and well-drained soil to thrive. They can be susceptible to pests and diseases, but are generally easy to grow and maintain. In terms of care, it is important to plant the tubers of dinner plate dahlias about 8 inches deep and 3 feet apart. They require regular watering and fertilization, especially once they start to bloom. Deadheading, or removing spent flowers, can help prolong the blooming period. Dinner plate dahlias are also popular cut flowers, they can last up to a week in a vase, and they can be brought inside to enjoy their beauty.

TITLE: Votaniki Purple Dinner Plate Dahlia Vancouver Bulbs - Easy to Grown | Large Blooms | Great for Cutting Gardens - Dahlia Flower Bulbs for Planting (4 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Dinner Plate Dahlia is known for its large, 10-inch blooms. The flowers have a flattened shape, like a dinner plate Purple color. The plant itself can grow to be quite tall, up to 5 feet, and is ideal for the back of a border or as a focal point in a garden bed. It blooms in late summer to fall and its tubers can be saved over winter in cold climates and re-planted the following spring. They are also very popular in cut-flower arrangements. Dinner Plate Dahlias like "Vancouver" are cultivars of the species Dahlia hybrida. They are popular for their large, showy blooms and long blooming period, often from late summer to the first frost. These dahlias require full sun and well-drained soil to thrive. They can be susceptible to pests and diseases, but are generally easy to grow and maintain. In terms of care, it is important to plant the tubers of dinner plate dahlias about 8 inches deep and 3 feet apart. They require regular watering and fertilization, especially once they start to bloom. Deadheading, or removing spent flowers, can help prolong the blooming period. Dinner plate dahlias are also popular cut flowers, they can last up to a week in a vase, and they can be brought inside to enjoy their beauty.

TITLE: Votaniki Anemone De Caen Mix Bulbs - Long Lasting Vibrant and Colorful Flowers for Garden - Perennial, Fast Growing Anemone Flower Bulbs for Planting (50 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: The Mix Bulbs are a stunning collection of Anemones that produce a range of beautiful flowers in a variety of colors. These anemones are easy to grow and care for, making them a great choice for novice and experienced gardeners alike. The mix contains flower bulbs in shades of pink, purple, red, and white, each producing large, vibrant flowers with a distinct, dark center. The flowers bloom in mid to late spring, providing a burst of color to any garden or landscape. Anemone De Caen bulbs are best planted in the fall, in well-drained soil with plenty of sunlight. They should be planted about 2-3 inches deep, with a spacing of around 6 inches between each bulb. With proper care and attention, the Anemone De Caen Bulbs can produce beautiful flowers year after year. In addition to their stunning appearance, these Anemones are also great for attracting pollinators to your garden, such as bees and butterflies. They are also deer-resistant, making them a great choice for gardens in areas with high deer populations. Each bulb of Anemone De Caen can produce up to 8 flowers, providing a stunning display that lasts for several weeks. These Anemones are versatile and can be planted in a range of garden styles, from traditional cottage gardens to modern, minimalist landscapes. They look particularly striking when planted in large groups or drifts, creating a natural and informal look. The Anemone De Caen is very low maintenance, requiring minimal care beyond the regular watering and occasional fertilization. They can even be left in the ground over winter, making them an excellent choice for gardeners who prefer low-effort, high-reward gardening.

TITLE: Votaniki Tahiti Dahlia Bulbs for Planting - Perennial Dahlia Bulbs, Large, Vibrant Blooms for a Long-Lasting Garden Display (1 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Votaniki Tahiti Dahlia bulbs are a stunning addition to any garden. These bulbs produce large, brightly colored blooms in a variety of hues including pink, and yellow. The petals are ruffled and full, adding texture and depth to floral arrangements. Tahiti dahlias are known for their long blooming period, making them a great choice for gardeners looking to add color to their landscape throughout the summer and into fall. Plant the bulbs in well-drained soil in a sunny location and with proper care, you will be rewarded with a beautiful display of blooms. These bulbs are easy to grow, making them a great choice for both experienced and novice gardeners. In addition to their beauty, Tahiti Dahlia bulbs are also versatile plants. They can be planted in beds, borders, or even in containers. They are also a popular choice for cutting gardens, as the large blooms make for beautiful bouquets. The plants can grow up to 4 feet tall and 3 feet wide, so make sure to give them enough space in your garden. Tahiti dahlias are also relatively low maintenance. They require regular watering and deadheading to prolong blooming, but are otherwise easy to care for. When planting Tahiti dahlia bulbs, it is recommended to plant them at a depth of about 6 inches, with the pointed end facing up. They should be spaced about 18 inches apart.

Black Hollyhocks flowers are a favorite of pollinators, attracting bees, butterflies, and hummingbirds to your garden. Black Hollyhocks are also suitable for cut flower arrangements, bringing a touch of the outdoors into your home. Add the elegant and eye-catching Black Hollyhocks to your garden! Black Hollyhocks are also low-maintenance and drought-tolerant, making them a great choice for busy gardeners or those in drier climates. They prefer full sun but can also grow in partially shaded areas. Black Hollyhocks grow best in rich, well-draining soil and should be watered regularly during the growing season. If you're looking for an attractive and productive addition to your garden, look no further than the Climax Blueberry Plant. This versatile and easy-to-grow plant is perfect for the home gardener who wants a healthy and delicious crop of blueberries every summer.

Climax Blueberry Plant is easy to grow and can be planted in either full sun or partial shade. It is highly adaptable to a variety of soil types, as long as the soil is well-draining and slightly acidic. One of the standout features of the Climax Blueberry Plant is its large, plump berries. These berries have a bright, blue color that contrasts beautifully with the plant's deep green foliage. The berries are not only visually appealing, but they are also sweet and delicious, making them perfect for fresh eating, cooking, and baking. Climax Blueberry Plant is a deciduous plant that can grow up to 6 feet tall and wide. It produces fragrant white flowers in the spring, followed by a heavy crop of blueberries in the summer. This plant is self-fertile, so you don't need to plant multiple bushes to get a good harvest. If you're looking for an attractive and productive addition to your garden, look no further than the Climax Blueberry Plant. This versatile and easy-to-grow plant is perfect for the home gardener who wants a healthy and delicious crop of blueberries every summer.

TITLE: Votaniki Asiatic Lily Mix Bulbs - Tiger Lily Bulbs for Planting | Perennial Bulbs, Cut Flower, Easy to Grow Lily Flowering Bulbs, Large Blooms (3 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Votaniki Asiatic Lily Mix Flower Bulbs for Spring Planting Perennial Bulb Plants, Seeds & BulbsAsiatic Lily Mixed is a random mix of colors and may include white, yellow, orange, red, pink or other hues. Blooming in June-July, Asiatic Lilies feature upward facing, trumpet-shaped flowers that attract butterflies. with dark to light shades Asiatic lilly plants for garden sometimes looks like shadows, sometimes like a jewel tone stars in your garden and lawn. How to Plant Asiatic lily flowers bulbsFor outdoor plants live, find a full sun location that provides shelter from high winds and dig holes 8 –18" apart. Place the bulbs for planting in spring with their tops 4 – 6 inches below the soil surface and the slightly pointy end facing up. Dig holes and plant your Lilies close to each other with hips roughly 4" apart. Tuck them down 4–6" inches into the soil with the bulbs' pointy part facing upwards. Specification:Common Name: Asiatic Lily Bulbs MixBotanical Name: Lilium asiaticum MixFlower Color: Mixed ColorsFlower Size: 4-6" flowersFoliage: Narrow, lanceolate, dark green leavesSun Light: Full Sun, Half ShadeBloom Time: Late Spring to Mid-SummerMature Height: 32-36" tallBulb Size: 12-16 cmSoil Type: Loamy SoilSoil Moisture: Average, Well-Draining Package Includes: 7 Pieces of Mix Asiatic bulbs Pruning Instructions:Don't remove leaves of mixed Asiatic day lillies flowers bulbs until they have died down in fall. They help provide nourishment to the bulb for next season's blooms.

TITLE: Votaniki Picotee Pink & White Begonia Bulbs - Large Bloom, Perennial, Pink & White Flowering Bulbs for Planting - AmeriHybrid Picotee White Pink, Easy to Grow, Low-Maintenance Flower Plant (1 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Votaniki Picotee Pink & White Begonia Bulbs are a beautiful and vibrant addition to any garden. These bulbs are prized for their stunning, contrasting colors and their ability to bloom repeatedly throughout the growing season. The flowers have a deep pink hue with white edges, creating a captivating and eye-catching look. Picotee Pink & White Begonia is a tuberous begonia, meaning it grows from underground bulbs that store energy for the plant. These flower plants are hardy and easy to care for, making them a popular choice for gardeners of all levels of experience. When planted in well-drained soil and exposed to partial sun, the Picotee Pink & White Begonia will produce an abundance of blooms from spring to fall. In addition to their beauty, the Picotee Pink & White Begonia is also a great choice for gardeners looking for low-maintenance plants. These begonias are heat and drought-tolerant. Furthermore, Picotee Pink & White Begonia Bulbs are versatile and can be used in a variety of garden settings, including borders, containers, or hanging baskets. When grown in pots or baskets, the pendulous blooms can trail down, creating a stunning display. They also make great indoor plants and are ideal for brightening up a sunny windowsill. Whether you're an experienced gardener or just starting out, these flowering plants are easy to care for and will bring a touch of color and charm to your outdoor space for many seasons to come.

TITLE: Votaniki Superstition Bearded Iris Bulbs - Perennial Iris Flowering Bulbs for Eye Catching Display | Fast Growing & Low Maintenance Iris for Any Garden (1 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Votaniki Superstition Bearded Iris is a stunning addition to any garden or landscape. These Iris produce gorgeous flowers that bloom in late spring to early summer, showcasing deep purple petals with a hint of black. Superstition Bearded Iris is known for their hardiness and adaptability, making them a popular choice among gardeners of all levels. They grow to a height of 36 inches and can spread up to 18 inches, producing multiple stems per bulb, with each stem bearing multiple blooms. Superstition Bearded Iris thrives in well-drained soil, with at least six hours of sunlight per day. They are low maintenance and require little attention, making them perfect for those with busy schedules. These Iris are also deer and rabbit-resistant, making them a great choice for those living in areas with wildlife. Superstition Bearded Iris is also known for their longevity, with each bulb producing beautiful flowers for multiple years. They are easy to propagate, making them a great option for those looking to expand their iris collection or share with friends and family. When planting the Superstition Bearded Iris Bulbs, it is recommended to plant them in the fall, about six weeks before the first frost. The bulbs should be planted with the pointed end facing upwards, and should be placed about 2-3 inches deep in the soil. It is important to space the bulbs at least 12-18 inches apart to allow for proper growth. Once planted, the Superstition Bearded Iris Bulbs require little maintenance. They should be watered regularly, especially during the growing season, but should not be overwatered as this can lead to root rot. Fertilizer can be added once or twice a year to promote growth and blooming.

TITLE: Votaniki Snowdon Gladiolus Bulbs - Large Flower, Versatile, Perennial Gladiolus Bulbs for Planting - Low Maintance & Easy to Grow (12 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Votaniki Snowdon Gladiolus is a stunning variety of gladiolus that produce elegant white flowers. These Gladiolus are is named after the highest mountain in Wales, Snowdon, which is known for its rugged beauty and majesty. Snowdon Gladiolus is easy to grow and produces tall, sturdy stalks that can reach up to 4 feet in height. Each stalk produces multiple blooms, creating a dramatic display of pure white color. These blooms are perfect for adding a touch of elegance to any garden or floral arrangement. Snowdon Gladiolus is ideal for planting in the spring, and they prefer well-drained soil with full sun exposure. They are also quite versatile and can be used in a variety of settings, including formal gardens, cottage gardens, and containers. When it comes to care, Snowdon Gladiolus is a relatively low-maintenance plant. They should be watered regularly but not overwatered, and any dead or fading blooms should be removed to encourage new growth. With proper care, these gladioli can produce stunning blooms for years to come. Snowdon Gladiolus are favorite among gardeners and florists because of their long vase life. The blooms can last up to two weeks in a vase, making them an excellent choice for cut flower arrangements. The Snowdon Gladiolus flowers are perfect for weddings, events, and other special occasions due to their delicate and sophisticated appearance.

DESCRIPTION: Votaniki Latham Red Raspberry Plant is a popular variety of raspberry plant that produces large, juicy, and sweet berries. This plant is known for its high yields, excellent flavor, and long fruiting season, making it a great choice for home gardeners and commercial growers alike. This hardy plant is tolerant of a wide range of growing conditions, including hot summers and cold winters. Latham Red Raspberry Plant is a vigorous grower and produces large, canes that are easy to train and support. The plant is also self-fertile, so you don't need to plant multiple varieties to get a good crop. The berries are medium to large in size, and they have a bright red color that makes them stand out in the garden. They are sweet, juicy, and full of flavor, making them perfect for eating fresh, baking in desserts, or preserving for later use. In addition to its culinary uses, the Latham Red Raspberry Plant is also attractive from a landscaping standpoint. The lush green leaves provide a lush, full look in the garden, and the bright red berries add a pop of color. The plant is also attractive to pollinators, making it a great addition to a wildlife-friendly garden. In conclusion, the Latham Red Raspberry Plant is an excellent choice for anyone looking to add a delicious and productive fruiting plant to their garden. With its high yields, great flavor, and ease of care, it's sure to be a hit with gardeners of all skill levels.

TITLE: Votaniki Pardon Me Daylily Bulbs - Perennial, Reblooming Daylily, Beautiful Blooms Year After Year - Perfect for Any Garden | Easy to Grow and Low Maintenance Daylily (3 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Pardon Me Daylily is a popular variety of daylilies that are prized for their stunning beauty and easy maintenance. These Daylily produce beautiful, trumpet-shaped flowers that bloom in shades of rich red with yellow accents. The petals of each flower are delicately ruffled, giving them a unique and distinctive look. One of the most impressive features of Pardon Me Daylily is its versatility. They can be planted in a variety of locations, from full sun to partial shade, and are adaptable to a wide range of soil conditions. These hardy perennials are also drought tolerant and require minimal maintenance, making them an excellent choice for gardeners of all skill levels. Pardon Me Daylily plants typically grow to a height of around 18 inches, with a spread of up to 24 inches. They bloom in midsummer and continue to produce flowers for several weeks. The plants also feature attractive foliage that adds texture and interest to any landscape. Pardon Me Daylily are also excellent for attracting pollinators such as bees, butterflies, and hummingbirds. Their nectar-rich flowers provide a valuable food source for these important insects and help to support healthy ecosystems. When planting Pardon Me Daylily Bulbs, it's important to choose a location with well-draining soil and adequate sunlight. They should be planted in the spring or fall, at a depth of around 1-2 inches. Once established, they require minimal care, although deadheading spent blooms can help to promote continued blooming throughout the season. Whether you're looking to add a pop of color to your garden or create a low-maintenance border, Pardon Me Daylily Bulbs are an excellent choice. Their beautiful blooms, easy care, and adaptability make them a must-have for any gardener looking to create a stunning and low-maintenance landscape.

TITLE: Votaniki Fall Gold Raspberry Quart Pot Root Start 6-12" - Perennial, High Yield, Fast Growing Raspberry Root Start Plant - Low Maintenance & Easy to Grow (4 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Votaniki Fall Gold Raspberry Quart Pot Root Start Plant - Fall Gold Raspberry plant is a beautiful and productive addition to any garden. This plant produces plump and juicy golden raspberries that are bursting with sweet, delicious flavor. The berries ripen in the late summer and early fall, making them a perfect late season treat. This raspberry plant is shipped in a quart-sized pot and comes as a root start, which means that it is ready to be planted and will quickly establish itself in your garden. It is a hardy and resilient plant that is easy to care for, making it a great choice for gardeners of all experience levels. The Fall Gold Raspberry plant is a perennial plant that can be grown in USDA hardiness zones 4 through 9. It prefers well-drained soil and full sun, but can also tolerate partial shade. It can be grown in containers or directly in the ground, and can be trained to grow on a trellis for easy maintenance and harvesting. In addition to producing delicious berries, the Fall Gold Raspberry plant also boasts beautiful foliage with bright green leaves that turn shades of yellow and red in the fall. This makes it a great choice for adding color and interest to your garden throughout the year. When planting your Fall Gold Raspberry Root Start plant, be sure to choose a well-drained site with plenty of sunlight. Dig a hole that is slightly larger than the pot and backfill it with soil, making sure to water the plant well after planting. Water regularly, especially during hot and dry periods, and fertilize once in the spring and again in the fall.

These bulbs produce tall, stately spikes of blooms in a variety of colors, including red, blue, and white. The flowers are large and showy, making them perfect for cut arrangements or as a focal point in the garden. Gladiolus Mix bulbs are easy to grow and are ideal for beginner gardeners. They prefer full sun and well-drained soil and are hardy in zones 7-10. The bulbs can be planted in the spring for summer blooms or in the fall for blooms the following summer. Each Gladiolus Mix bulb is carefully packaged to ensure it arrives in top condition and is ready to plant as soon as it arrives. With proper care, these bulbs will return year after year, providing a stunning display of color in your garden. Gladiolus Mix bulbs are also a great option for those looking to add height and drama to their garden beds. The tall spikes of blooms can reach up to 5 feet in height, making them ideal for planting at the back of a border or in a mixed container garden. The blooms also attract a variety of pollinators, including bees, butterflies, and hummingbirds, providing an important source of food for these important species. When planting Gladiolus Mix bulbs, it is important to plant them deep enough so that the top of the bulb is covered by several inches of soil. Space the bulbs 6-8 inches apart and water regularly, especially during dry spells. After the blooms have faded, the foliage should be allowed to yellow and die back naturally before cutting it back to the ground. This will allow the bulbs to store energy for the following year's blooms.

In spring, the flowers give way to dark blue berries that are enjoyed by birds. The Japanese Snowball Bush is an adaptable plant that grows well in a range of soils and conditions, making it ideal for a variety of landscapes. It is also low-maintenance and easy to care for, making it a great choice for gardeners of all levels of experience. This shrub is deciduous and loses its leaves in winter, revealing its attractive branching structure. It also makes a beautiful addition to a shrub or flowering hedge, providing year-round interest and beauty to your garden. In conclusion, the Viburnum Japanese Snowball Bush is an excellent choice for anyone looking to add a unique and striking plant to their garden. With its beautiful flowers, dark blue berries, and attractive foliage, this plant is sure to be a standout in any landscape.

TITLE: Nike Men's Trail Running Shoe, Noir, 13
DESCRIPTION: Whether you're taking a trek through Manoa Valley's lush green forest or navigating Mt. Baldy's narrow trails, do it comfortably in a pair of these leather hiking boots from Nike ACG! Foam-padded collar with webbing heel pull loop for easy on and off. Breathable mesh lining with a padded footbed for all-day comfort. Toe bumper wraps up for comfort and enhanced protection in this high-wear area. Flex-grooves along the length and width of the outsole enhance flexibility for a smooth, efficient stride. Durable, trail-inspired rubber outsole with lug-patterned tread for exceptional traction on a variety of surfaces.

TITLE: Votaniki Stained Glass Hosta Bulbs - Beautiful Leaves, Perennial Hosta Bulbs for Planting - Perfect Addition to Any Garden | Fast Growing and Low Maintenance Plants (1 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Stained Glass Hosta is a stunning addition to any garden or landscape. These Hosta produce lush, vibrant green leaves with yellow color. As the plant matures, the variegation becomes more prominent, creating a beautiful and eye-catching display. The Stained Glass Hosta is a hardy perennial that can grow up to 18 inches in height and spread up to 36 inches wide. It thrives in partial to full shade and prefers well-draining soil. With proper care, these bulbs can produce beautiful foliage throughout the growing season and can even be divided to create additional plants. In addition to their aesthetic appeal, Stained Glass Hostas are also known for their ability to attract hummingbirds and other pollinators to the garden. They are also resistant to deer and rabbits, making them a great choice for gardens in areas with heavy wildlife. Stained Glass Hostas also make great container plants, perfect for adding a pop of color to patios or balconies. Their compact size and low-maintenance nature make them ideal for container gardening. Stained Glass Hosta Bulbs are shipped in a dormant state and can be planted in the early spring or fall. They should be planted with the crown of the bulb just below the soil surface and watered regularly until established. In conclusion, Stained Glass Hosta Bulbs are a beautiful and versatile plant that can add a unique touch of color and texture to any garden or landscape. They are easy to care for, attract pollinators and can be used in a variety of settings

TITLE: Votaniki Blue Butterfly Bush 1-2 Ft Plant - Buddleia Davidii Flowering Plant | Fragrant, Fast Growing, Attracts Pollinators, Perennial Flowering Shrub (4 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Votaniki Blue Butterfly Bush (Buddleia davidii) is a beautiful shrub that produces clusters of blue, violet, or lavender flowers. This fast-growing plant can reach up to 10 feet in height and is a popular choice for gardens, patios, and outdoor spaces. The blooms are highly attractive to butterflies, hence its name, and provide a stunning display from mid-summer to fall. Blue Butterfly Bush is easy to care for, tolerating most soil types and growing well in full sun or partial shade. It is also drought-resistant and low maintenance, making it an ideal choice for gardeners of all levels. The plant can be pruned back each year to keep its size under control and promote healthy growth. If you're looking for a vibrant and eye-catching addition to your outdoor space, Blue Butterfly Bush is an excellent choice! Blue Butterfly Bush is also an important source of nectar for pollinators such as bees, hummingbirds, and, of course, butterflies. It is known for its fragrant aroma, which adds an extra sensory element to the garden. This plant is also versatile, working well as a standalone specimen, in mass plantings, or as part of a mixed border. Blue Butterfly Bush is hardy in USDA zones 5-9, making it suitable for a wide range of growing conditions across the country. To ensure optimal growth and flowering, it is recommended to provide the plant with well-drained soil and regular watering during dry periods. With its stunning blooms, sweet fragrance, and ease of care, Blue Butterfly Bush is a must-have for any garden lover.

TITLE: Votaniki Caladium Bulbs for Planting - Fancy Leaf Mixed Caladium Bulbs for Planting Bulk Spring Bulbs to Plant in Spring Bulbs for Planting Outdoors - Elephant Ears Bulbs for Planting Indoor
DESCRIPTION: Growing Conditions:Fancy-Leafed Caladium live outdoor plants are requires full sun light although these might grow in indirect sun light condition like indoor in the window sill, where these bulbs for planting in spring get proper light, Caladiums are thirsty plants and prefer plenty of moisture in the soil. These spring bulbs for planting will happily grow under trees and larger shrubs that give the required shade, just take care that they’re not planted right in the thick of the tree’s roots, in fierce competition for water in the soil as they may not get their required moisture level. Fancy-Leafed Caladiums cultivars:Aaron: is white with green margins and has some sun tolerance.Candidum: is an old cultivar that has white leaves with green veins.Carolyn Whorton: has pink leaves with red veins and green margins.Fire Chief: is a dark pink, with limited sun tolerance.Florida Elise: has green leaves with rose pink brush strokes and speckles and tolerates more sun.Florida Fantasy: is white with red veins.Freida Hemple: is deep red with green margins and no sun tolerance.Gypsy Rose: has pink veins with green blotches.June Bride: is white with green margins.Kathleen: is red with green margins.Marie Moir: is whitish green with red spots.  How to Plant CaladiumsIn northern and central regions, plant caladium tubers about 6" apart. To get a nice, full spread look. In southern regions these live plants outdoor bulb can be planted further apart. When planting in containers, you may want to put them closer together to get full bulky look of mixed Fancy-Leafed Caladium leaves.

TITLE: Votaniki Premium Quality Dahlia Contraste Flower Bulbs - Red and White Blooms | Summer Blooming Dahlia Bulbs (8 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Dahlia Contraste is a variety of dahlia flower. It is a cultivar which produces red and white semi-cactus type blooms. The flower is medium-sized and is usually used as cut flower. They grow tall and the plant will produce a lot of blooms. They should be planted in full sun, and they do best in well-drained soil with consistent moisture. They grow well in USDA hardiness zones 8-11, and they can be grown as annuals in other zones. They can be propagated by tubers or by cuttings. They are generally grown as a summer flowering annuals. Dahlia Contraste is an outstanding addition to any garden or as a cut flower. They grow to a height of 3-4 feet, and produce large and striking blooms of striking red and white color. The blooms are semi-cactus type and can reach up to 6 inches in diameter. The plant typically begins blooming in mid-summer and continues to bloom until the first frost. Dahlias have a tuberous root system and should be planted in well-drained soil in a sunny location. They should be planted at the same depth as the tubers and spaced about 2-3 feet apart. They need regular watering and fertilization. They are relatively low maintenance, however, they benefit from deadheading spent blooms, staking, and disbudding to promote bigger blooms. You can over-winter dahlia tubers in a dry, cool place and then replant them in the spring. Or you can also dig up the tubers after the first frost and store them in a dry, cool place over winter.

TITLE: Votaniki Peter Pears Gladiolus Bulbs - Fragrant Blooms, Perennial, Large Flowering Orage Gladiolus Bulbs - Easy to Grow & Low Maintenance (6 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Peter Pears Gladiolus is a beautiful and vibrant addition to any garden. These Gladiolus bulbs produce stunning tall spikes of coral-orange blooms, which are sure to catch the eye of any passerby. The flowers are lightly fragrant, making them a delight to the senses. Each bulb produces multiple stems, with each stem bearing up to 20 individual flowers. The flowers are long-lasting, providing weeks of color and beauty in the garden. They are perfect for cut flower arrangements, adding a pop of color and elegance to any floral display. Peter Pears Gladiolus bulbs are easy to plant and care for. They thrive in full sun and well-drained soil. Plant them in the spring, and they will bloom in mid to late summer. These gladiolus plants grow to be around 3-4 feet tall, and their spikes are strong and sturdy, making them ideal for outdoor planting. They are also suitable for indoor planting, either in pots or containers, where their stunning blooms can be enjoyed up close. When planting Peter Pears Gladiolus bulbs, it is recommended to plant them in groups of at least 10-12 bulbs, as this will create a more dramatic impact in your garden. They should be planted around 6 inches deep and 6 inches apart, in well-drained soil. In addition to their aesthetic appeal, Peter Pears Gladiolus bulbs also have practical applications. They are commonly used in landscaping projects to add color and texture to gardens and public spaces. Their long-lasting blooms make them an excellent choice for cut flower arrangements, adding a touch of elegance and sophistication to any home or event.

TITLE: Votaniki Giant Liatris Spicata Blazing Star Bulbs - Purple Flowers, Easy to Grow | Liatris Bulbs - Perennial Wildflower (20 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Blazing Star, also known as Giant Liatris or Liatris spicata, is a perennial wildflower that is native to North America. It is known for its tall spikes of showy, purple flowers that bloom in late summer and early fall. The plant can grow up to 3-4 feet tall and has grass-like leaves that are arranged along the stem. Blazing Star is a hardy plant that can grow in a variety of soil types as long as they are well-drained. It prefers full sun to light shade and is drought-tolerant once established. It's also attracts butterflies, bees, and other pollinators. Planting Blazing Star bulbs is relatively easy. The bulbs should be planted in the spring, after the last frost has passed, at a depth of about 3 inches and about 6 inches apart. It's recommendable to make sure that the soil is well-drained, and mix some compost or organic matter in the soil before planting. Once established, Giant Liatris require very little maintenance. They can be left undisturbed for years, and they are also deer resistant. They don't require regular watering, and they can also tolerate drought conditions. In colder climates, Liatris Spicata are best treated as perennials and should be dug up in fall and replanted in spring. In areas where the ground doesn't freeze, they can be left in the ground year-round. Blazing Star makes a great cut flower and can be used in fresh or dried flower arrangements. They are also great for naturalizing in meadows, prairies, and wildflower gardens.

TITLE: Votaniki Minuteman Hosta - Gorgeous Foliage, Perennial, Fast Growing - Hosta Bare Root Ready to Plant | Low Maintenance & Easy to Grow (1 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: The Minuteman Hosta is a stunning perennial plant that is perfect for adding a touch of elegance to the garden. With its striking green and white variegated leaves, this Hosta will brighten up any shady area with its bold and beautiful foliage. This bare root plant is easy to plant and care for, making it an excellent choice for both novice and experienced gardeners. It grows to a mature size of 18-24 inches in height and 24-36 inches in width, making it an ideal choice for filling in empty spaces in the garden. The Minuteman Hosta is a versatile plant that can thrive in a variety of soil types and light conditions, making it an excellent choice for a wide range of garden styles. Minuteman Hosta is a clump-forming perennial that is well-suited for planting in containers, rock gardens, and borders In the summer, Minuteman Hosta produces tall spikes of lavender flowers that rise above the foliage, adding an extra layer of interest to the plant. These flowers are attractive to hummingbirds and pollinators, making them a great addition to any garden. When planting your Minuteman Hosta, make sure to choose a location that receives partial to full shade. This Hosta variety prefers moist, well-drained soil. As a bare root plant, Minuteman Hosta is shipped without soil or foliage, but it will quickly establish itself once planted. Simply soak the roots in water for a few hours before planting, then dig a hole slightly larger than the root ball and place the plant in the hole, making sure to cover the roots with soil. Water well after planting, and continue to water regularly until the plant is established.

After blooming, the flowers should be deadheaded to encourage the plant to produce more blooms. Casa Blanca lilies are also known for their sweet fragrance. DESCRIPTION: Votaniki Arabian Night dahlia bulbs produce beautiful, dark, almost black, semi-double to double blooms on strong stems. Arabian Night dahlia are perfect for cutting and are great for adding drama and depth to any garden or floral arrangement. These dahlia bulbs will grow to be 3-4 feet tall and bloom in late summer to early fall. Arabian Night dahlia prefer full sun and well-drained soil, and are hardy in zones 8-11. In addition to their striking blooms, Arabian Night dahlias are also known for their hardiness and long blooming period. TITLE: Votaniki Reliance Grape Plant 1-2 Years Old - Perennial, Fast Growing | Easy to Grow and High-Yielding Grape Plant - Perfect for Any Graden (1 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Votaniki Reliance Grape Plant 1-2 Years Old - Reliance Grape Plant is a fruit-bearing plant that is ideal for growing in home gardens or small farms. This plant is specifically designed to produce plump and juicy grapes that are perfect for eating fresh, making juice, or even turning into wine. The Reliance Grape Plant is a self-fertile variety, which means it does not require a second grape plant to produce fruit. This makes it an excellent option for those who only have limited space in their garden. The plant is also relatively easy to care for and can be grown in a variety of soil types, although it prefers well-draining soil with a pH level between 6.0 and 7.0. When mature, the Reliance Grape Plant can produce a large yield of grapes. The fruit is typically medium-sized, sweet, and juicy. The grapes ripen in early to mid-September, making them a late-season variety that can be enjoyed when many other fruits are out of season. Reliance Grape Plant is a hybrid variety that was created by breeding different grape varieties to create a plant that is resistant to cold temperatures and produces sweet, juicy fruit. This plant is known for its hardiness and ability to withstand harsh growing conditions. When planting the Reliance Grape Plant, it is important to choose a sunny location that has good drainage. The plant requires regular watering, especially during the first year after planting, to help establish its root system. Pruning is also necessary to help maintain the plant's shape and encourage healthy growth.

Cascade Begonia is a hybrid plant that was developed to have a more controlled growth habit and a more uniform flower production, making them ideal for pots, baskets, and mixed containers. They are also great for garden beds and borders, where their upright growth habit and delicate blooms will add a graceful touch. Cascade Begonia are easy to grow, and thrive in a range of soils and climates, from cool and moist to warm and dry. They prefer filtered light and slightly acidic soil with good drainage. Once planted, they will quickly form a clump of lush green foliage, topped with delicate flowers that bloom continuously throughout the summer and fall. Cascade Begonia are also very durable, and once established, they will come back year after year, providing you with a continual source of vibrant, eye-catching blooms. These bulbs are also perfect for indoor use, as they will flower in bright, indirect light and make great houseplants. If you're looking for a hardy, low-maintenance plant that will bring a burst of color to your home or garden, Cascade Begonia bulbs are the perfect choice.

TITLE: Votaniki Black & White Calla Lily Mix Bulbs - Long Lasting Blooms, Perennial Calla Lily Flower Bulbs | Perfect for Cut Flowers and Garden Beds - Easy to Grow and Low Maintenance (6 Pack)
DESCRIPTION: Calla Lily bulbs produce elegant, trumpet-shaped flowers that are sure to catch the eye and add a touch of sophistication to any setting. This Mix of Calla Lily bulbs produces multiple flowers in shades of white & Black. The flowers can grow up to 2 feet tall and are held atop long, slender stems. The glossy, green foliage provides a beautiful backdrop to the flowers, making them stand out even more. Calla Lily is easy to grow and care for. They prefer well-drained soil and full sun or partial shade. Bulbs can be planted in the spring or fall, and will typically bloom in the summer or early fall. Calla Lilies are also suitable for container gardening and can be grown indoors as houseplants. Calla Lily is a popular choice for wedding and event decor, as they add a touch of elegance and sophistication to any floral arrangement. Calla lilies are a versatile choice for any garden, as they can be used in a variety of ways. They look great planted in groups or as a border plant, and they can also be used as a cut flower to bring indoors. When planting Calla Lily bulbs, it's important to make sure they are planted at the correct depth. The top of the bulb should be just below the surface of the soil. It's also important to keep the soil moist, but not waterlogged, during the growing season. Calla Lilies are generally low maintenance, but they may need to be divided every few years to prevent overcrowding. Dividing the bulbs will also promote new growth and ensure that the plants continue to produce beautiful blooms year after year.

DESCRIPTION: Votaniki Adirondack Blue Potato is a unique and flavorful variety of potatoes that are grown in the Adirondack Mountains of New York. They produce multiple spikes of blooms per bulb, which means that a single plant can produce an impressive display of flowers.
